basis: User explicitly states they prepared a single-plate meal (grilled chicken + steamed broccoli + quinoa) within 5 minutes and planned to log afterward.
cognitive_dissonance: No evident internal conflict; expressed commitment to the anchor.
negative_thought_patterns: Cravings/binge thoughts acknowledged in prior turns; current message shows planning to resist with a simple cue; no persistent negative self-talk observed.
emotional_triggers: Potential triggers include stress and cravings; user references leaning on plan when stressed.
coaching_notes: Continue reinforcing the anchor with brief cues; encourage immediate post-meal logging; address cravings with simple, non-judgmental reminders; keep tone supportive and practical.
